mapper.select: select * from ugc_label_data_analysis where (status = 'DONE' or status='FAIL') and config_environment=#{configEnvironment} order by updated_at ASC limit 20
mapper.update: update ugc_label_data_analysis set status='FAIL' where id = #{id} and config_environment = #{configEnvironment}

insert into ugc_label_data_analysis(id,name, address, api_level, mode, labels, status, analysis_result, created_at, updated_at, removed, config_environment, type, "sql") values
(#{item.id}, #{item.name},#{item.address},#{item.apiLevel},#{item.mode},#{item.labels}, #{item.status},#{item.analysisResult},#{item.createdAt},#{item.updatedAt}, #{item.removed}, #{configEnvironment} ,#{item.type},#{item.sql})
on conflict (id, config_environment) do update set status=EXCLUDED.status, name = EXCLUDED.name, api_level = EXCLUDED.api_level , type = EXCLUDED.type, "sql" = EXCLUDED."sql"
mapper.select: select batch_date from tag_result where table_name = #{resultTableName} order by batch_date desc limit 1
select analysis_date,analysis_result from home_data_analysis where config_environment = #{configEnvironment} order by analysis_date desc limit 1
